duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and direct delivery associates, ensuring adherence to standard operating procedures and planned routes.
Analyze delivery data to maintain optimal delivery plans and customer service.
Supervise labor hours and recommend work schedules and necessary changes.
Coordinate asset utilization and facilitate required repairs.
Review delivery productivity reporting and suggest efficiency ideas.
Interpret, train, and apply company policies and protocols, including safety, record-keeping, and performance expectations.
Communicate with Sales Management and Marketing Associates, resolving customer or delivery issues collaboratively.
Proactively communicate with drivers to ensure adherence to delivery schedules and performance goals.
Coordinate training and safety activities, making recommendations for disciplinary action based on performance data.
Utilize canned reporting, create ad hoc reports, and demonstrate proficiency with Microsoft Office suite.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma; Two or four-year college degree in Business Management, Supply Chain Management or similar major preferred.
